import { useRef, useState } from "react"; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import './Auth.css'; const Auth = () => { const emailInputRef = useRef(); const passwordInputRef = useRef(); const [isLogin, setIsLogin] = useState(true); return (

Welcome!!!!









{isLogin ? 'Login' : 'Sign Up'}

Forgot Password?

) }; export default Auth;
